name: run
shortDescription: Runs an Architect target with an optional custom builder configuration defined in your project.
longDescription:
Architect is the tool that the CLI uses to perform complex tasks such as compilation, according to provided configurations.
The CLI commands run Architect targets such as `build`, `serve`, `test`, and `lint`.
Each named target has a default configuration, specified by an `options` object,
and an optional set of named alternate configurations in the `configurations` object.

For example, the `serve` target for a newly generated app has a predefined
alternate configuration named `production`.

You can define new targets and their configuration options in the `architect` section
of the `angular.json` file which you can run them from the command line using the `ng run` command.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.
options.descriptionCn: 在控制台显示关于本命令的帮助信息。

options.name: target
options.description: The Architect target to run provided in the the following format `project:target[:configuration]`.
options.descriptionCn: 要运行的建筑师目标，以如下格式提供 `project:target[:configuration]`

shortDescriptionCn: 在你的项目中运行一个带有自定义构建器配置的建筑师目标（Architect target）。
longDescriptionCn:
Architect 是 CLI 根据提供的配置用于执行复杂任务（例如编译）的工具。 CLI 命令会运行 Architect 目标，例如`build`、`serve`、`test` 和 `lint` 。每个命名目标都有一个默认配置，由`options` 对象指定，以及 `configurations` 对象中的一组可选的命名备用配置。

例如，新生成的应用程序的 `serve` 目标有一个名为 `production` 的预定义替代配置。

你可以在 `angular.json` `文件的 architect` 部分中定义新目标及其配置选项。你可以用 `ng run` 命令从命令行运行它们。
